requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics Preset: LOW | FXAA; Resolution: 1080p; Target FPS: 60

  • Additional Notes: Graphics Preset: MAXIMUM; Resolution: 1080p; Target FPS: 60
